name: Gnome Turkey
step: Crochet the body using brown yarn
Crochet the hat using brown and beige yarn
Crochet the wings using brown, orange, beige and yellow yarn
Crochet the beak using yellow yarn
Crochet the beard using white yarn
Crochet the snood using red yarn
Sew everything together

name: Halloween Kitty
step: Crochet the head using white yarn
Crochet the ears using white yarn
Crochet the arms using white yarn
Crochet the hat using orange and green yarn
Sew everything together

name: Spring Eggs
step: Crochet the ears using pink and dark pink yarn
Crochet the body using white and pink yarn
Sew everything together

name: Sunflower summer
step: Crochet the head using light peach yarn
Crochet the petals using yellow yarn
Crochet the leaf using green yarn
Crochet the pot using brown yarn
Sew everything together

name: Winter Gnome
step: Crochet the body using baby blue yarn
Crochet the nose using beige yarn
Crochet the hat using sky blue yarn
Crochet the beard using white yarn
Crochet the hands using white yarn
Sew everything together

name: Christmas bear
step: Crochet the muzzle using beige yarn
Crochet the head using light brown yarn
Crochet the ears using light brown yarn
Crochet the handles using green yarn
Crochet the body using gree yarn
Crochet the jacket using white yarn
Sew everything together

name: Margarita la flor
step: Crochet the pot using beige yarn
Crochet the dirt using brown yarn
Crochet the skirt using yellow yarn
Crochet the steam using green yarn
Crochet the hear using white yarn
Crochet the hat using pink and yellow yarn
Sew everything together
